00C: sorry for being slightly inactive...

--- Axis ---

Axis bows, and nods at Nightlight. "I've only shown them the control 
room, so that should give you an idea of what else they need to 
see." The larger bot turns and follows Aerotaur, "Sir Aerotaur, is 
there anything that needs to be done now, or would you rather i 
accompagny you?"

base... "
